file.name: spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  title: Minha Api de tarefas a fazer
  version: 1.0.0
  
servers:
  - url: http://dunossauro.com/
  - url: http://dunossauro.com.br
  - url: http://dunossauro.net
  - url: 192.168.0.1  

components:
  parameters:
    ID:
      in: path
      name: id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
        minimum: 1
  schemas:
    Tarefa:
      type: object
      required:
        - todo
      properties:
        todo:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
    Tarefas:
      type: object
      required:
        - tarefas
      properties:
        tarefas: 
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tarefa'
    ErrorResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
    NotFoundError:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string

paths:
  /tarefa:
    post:
      summary: Cria uma tarefa
      description: Cria uma tarefa usando o payload xpto, yz. O status default é a fazer
      parameters:
        - name: Tarefa
          in: path
          required: True
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tarefa'
      responses:
        201:
          description: Deu certo, criado!
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tarefa'
              examples:
                user:
                  summary: User Example
                  externalValue: 'https://foo.bar/examples/user-example.json'
        422:
          description: Erro no Payload
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
    get:
      summary: Pega todas as tarefas
      description: Pega todos as tarefas da API
      responses:
        200:
          description: Deu certo!
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tarefas'
  
  /tarefa/{id}:
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ID'
    get:
      tags: ['com id']
      description: Pega uma tarefa por ID
      responses:
        200:
          description: Achou
        404:
          description: Não achou
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NotFoundError'
          
    patch:
      tags: ['com id']
      description: Pega uma tarefa por ID
      parameters:
        - name: Tarefa
          in: path
          required: True
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tarefa'
      responses:
        201:
          description: Alterou
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tarefas'
        404:
          description: Não achou
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NotFoundError'
          
    delete:
      tags: ['com id']
      description: Remove a tarefa
      responses:
        201:
          description: Achou
        404:
          description: Não achou
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NotFoundError'
